mapper.sql: id, permission_code, permission_name, resource_value, order_num, authc_type, create_user_id, modify_user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select: SELECT r.id AS id, r.role_code AS roleCode, p.permission_code AS permissionCode, p.resource_value AS resourceValue, p.authc_type AS authcType FROM s_role_permission rp LEFT JOIN s_role r ON r.id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN s_permission p ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE r.role_code IS NOT NULL

SELECT resource_value AS resourceValue, authc_type AS authcType FROM s_permission WHERE id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT (permission_id) FROM s_role_permission WHERE role_id IN ( SELECT role_id FROM s_user_role WHERE user_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} ) )
